sentences.en: A tidal wave caused by the earthquake hit the coast causing catastrophic damage.
sentences.cn: 地震引发的海啸袭击了海岸，造成了灾难性的损失。

sentences.en: All free nations have a stake in preventing sudden and catastrophic attacks.
sentences.cn: 防范灾难性的突发攻击事件,与所有自由的国度休戚相关.

sentences.en: Cathleen's plight seemed to her more startling than catastrophic.
sentences.cn: 她觉得凯瑟琳的情况主要是令人惊讶,而并非什么可悲的事.

sentences.en: Develop emergency action plans to facilitate efficient patient care in catastrophic situations.
sentences.cn: 拟定紧急应变计划,以促进重大伤病发生时病人能获得有效率的照护.

sentences.en: Figure 10 - 8 : Ejector seat levers have catastrophic results.
sentences.cn: 图10-8弹射操纵杆具有灾难般的后果.

sentences.en: Global warming per se is not really the problem; the catastrophic climate changes which might be caused by it are.
sentences.cn: 全球变暖本身并不是真正的问题；可能由它引发的灾害性天气变化才是问题所在。

sentences.en: His mother's untimely death had a catastrophic effect on him.
sentences.cn: 他母亲的早逝给了他沉重的打击。

sentences.en: In itself this was not a catastrophic turn.
sentences.cn: 就这件事本身而论,还不算是一次灾难性的变化.

sentences.en: In our business, a swing of 15 percent is catastrophic.
sentences.cn: 在我们这个行业中, 15%的变化实在是个灾难.

sentences.en: It has been predicted that the Earth will tilt on its axis , causing catastrophic famine and disease.
sentences.cn: 有人曾预言地球会导致大荒灾和疾病.

sentences.en: Relegation to the Third Division would prove catastrophic.
sentences.cn: 降到丙级将是灾难性的。

sentences.en: The decision to cut back on film-making had a catastrophic effect on the nurturing of new talent.
sentences.cn: 削减电影制作经费的决定在扶植新人方面有灾难性的影响。

sentences.en: The guilty president was suppressing the catastrophic news.
sentences.cn: 应该承担罪责的总统扣压着这个灾难性消息.

sentences.en: The minister gave a warning that if war broke out, it would be catastrophic.
sentences.cn: 部长警告说，战争一旦爆发将会是灾难性的。

sentences.en: The minister warned that if war broke out, it would be catastrophic for the whole world.
sentences.cn: 这位部长警告说，万一爆发战争，那对全世界都将是场灾难。

sentences.en: The situation in Afghanistan looks bad, but not yet catastrophic.
sentences.cn: 阿富汗的局势看上去很糟, 但迄今为止还不算是场灾难.

sentences.en: The water shortage in this country is potentially catastrophic.
sentences.cn: 该国水资源的匮乏很可能是灾难性的。

trans.tran_en: Something that is catastrophic involves or causes a sudden terrible disaster
